showerReviews.reviewText: This gym is one of the cleanest I've ever been to.  It's reasonably priced, there is support for low income, the trainers are amazing and I feel like the staff actually cares. …

This YMCA is very clean and everyone that I have encountered is friendly. I signed my daughter up so she could swim laps in her off-season and it’s nice you can schedule on your phone on an app. I would definitely recommend their amenities. Also it is only $22 for a monthly membership for children ages 12 to 18.

Though lacking in some weight lifting equipment, it's hard to knock it for what's it's not specialized for. The facility is fantastic and the place is always crazy clean for a gym like this. Always a quick in and out for workouts. Seems super family friendly with an open basketball court and daycare for parents.

Clean, all new equipment, good amenities. With membership you can use any Pittsburgh area Y. Good class variety, but the ones I'd like the most don't fit into my schedule. Pool is great for kids!! Locker rooms are fine, but being by the pool floor can get wet.

showerReviews.reviewText: First time visit during saturday evening was great! Gym was not busy at all. Really enjoyed the puzzles. Very clean facility and super friendly staff! Oh and they have phone tripods around the gym so you can record your send!
Everything is very clean and organized, and bathrooms are spotless and offer toiletries. …

A great bouldering gym. The place was clean, the routes were fun and diverse, the staff were friendly and personable, and the gear I rented was in great shape. I also love how they have grade meet ups once a month, yoga, and events …

Clean facility, spacious gym, and friendly staff!

It's definitely great for beginners, but the route setting doesn't feel quite as …

Nice gym. There are a ton of boulder routes and a nice looking gym. The setting was generally pretty good and the place was clean, well lit, and well staffed. The change rooms were quite nice. Overall, a nice place to climb in you are in the area

showerReviews.reviewText: I had my bridal shower here recently and it was the perfect spot. A large room with chairs/tables you can set up how you would like, a kitchen for all prepping needs & you have access to the community center all day. Located right off 376 …

We had our baby shower here recently, and the area is so quaint and peaceful. Our shower was amazing because of how great this space is. It had everything that we needed to make this event run smoothly. 10/10 would recommend.

My bridal shower was hosted here a few weeks ago. The space is great, the kitchen is super helpful. Great to DYI and save some money, and it was awesome to have the space for the whole day. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because …
Very nice place for a shower or private party. It has a full kitchen. It's the old Rosslyn Farms school. Right off of 376 and very easy to get to.

showerReviews.reviewText: Wonderful staff! Very caring and treat everyone with respect. Wish more attention paid to some maintenance issues and cleaning in the locker room. The Y seems to be consistent with deferred maintenance in all their facilities.

Very clean facility! I'm only giving stars for the swim Instructor V & the clean pool locker room. She was amazing teaching swimming patiently. I learnt alot. But its very very sad that YMCA cancelled ADULT SWIM classes on days where …

I love this Y! The staff is always polite, professional, and energetic. The atmosphere always has a family type atmosphere. All of T he equipment is in great shape and some of the machines are newer that you may not find at other gyms. The facility has an Olympic sized pool and a nice sauna. The facility ALWAYS clean.
This place is awesome! The staff are all so friendly and the facilities are great and they keep it clean too! Nice parking lot and good group class options at evening times.
